column5: Had a good morning fishing for bass at pond X today. Lots of bites on jighead and worm combo. They were prespawn on the points with deep water near. I was looking for the pods of Crappie but they hide well from me.   Here was one of the big fish of the day        Art
nice fish Art - 8 weeks till we can play with them green fightin machines 'round here. Hopefully spring will have arrived by then
Hey, that fish is in the slot...  Nice catch!
Do you think he knows that those measuring boards are "special" and are only sold to the tourists so they release more fish?
Yaa know I believe yaa it has some kind of cheater numbers on the bottom that are like 2 for 1 inches.  Art
why is the fish upsidedown? LOL  Nice

The back on this fish was huge and I couldn't get a good reading right side up. I can't wait for the Crappie to come up they are big and very tasty. The pond is 70% spring fed and the creek coming in is very clean and clear.   Art
